verses.verse: And there was given <S%G1325><s%> me a reed <S%G2563><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> to a rod: <S%G4464><s%> and the angel <S%G32><s%> stood, <S%G2476><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Rise, <S%G1453><s%> and measure <S%G3354><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the altar, <S%G2379><s%> and them that worship <S%G4352><s%> therein. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>

But the court <S%G833><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is without <S%G1855><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> leave <S%G1544><s%> out, and measure <S%G3354><s%> it not; for it is given <S%G1325><s%> to the Gentiles: <S%G1484><s%> and the holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> shall they tread <S%G3961><s%> under foot forty <S%G5062><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

And I will give <S%G1325><s%> power to my two <S%G1417><s%> witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> and they shall prophesy <S%G4395><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> two <S%G1250><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> and three score <S%G1835><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in sackcloth. <S%G4526><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are the two <S%G1417><s%> olive <S%G1636><s%> trees, and the two <S%G1417><s%> candlesticks <S%G3087><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man will <S%G2309><s%> hurt <S%G91><s%> them, fire <S%G4442><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> out of their mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and devours <S%G2719><s%> their enemies: <S%G2190><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man will <S%G2309><s%> hurt <S%G91><s%> them, he must <S%G1163><s%> in this <S%G3779><s%> manner <S%G3779><s%> be killed. <S%G615><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to shut <S%G2808><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> that it rain <S%G1026><s%> <S%G5205><s%> not in the days <S%G2250><s%> of their prophecy: <S%G4394><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> waters <S%G5204><s%> to turn <S%G4762><s%> them to blood, <S%G129><s%> and to smite <S%G3960><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> plagues, <S%G4127><s%> as often <S%G3740><s%> as they will. <S%G2309><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> they shall have finished <S%G5055><s%> their testimony, <S%G3141><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> that ascends <S%G305><s%> out of the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit shall make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> them, and shall overcome <S%G3528><s%> them, and kill <S%G615><s%> them.

And their dead <S%G4430><s%> bodies <S%G4430><s%> shall lie in the street <S%G4113><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> spiritually <S%G4153><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and Egypt, <S%G125><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our Lord <S%G2962><s%> was crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

And they of the people <S%G2992><s%> and kindreds <S%G5443><s%> and tongues <S%G1100><s%> and nations <S%G1484><s%> shall see <S%G991><s%> their dead <S%G4430><s%> bodies <S%G4430><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and an half, <S%G2255><s%> and shall not suffer <S%G863><s%> their dead <S%G4430><s%> bodies <S%G4430><s%> to be put <S%G5087><s%> in graves. <S%G3418><s%>

And they that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall rejoice <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them, and make <S%G2165><s%> merry, <S%G2165><s%> and shall send <S%G3992><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to another; <S%G240><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> tormented <S%G928><s%> them that dwelled <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and an half <S%G2255><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> them, and they stood <S%G2476><s%> on their feet; <S%G4228><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on them which saw <S%G2334><s%> them.

And they heard <S%G191><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, Come <S%G305><s%> up here. <S%G5602><s%> And they ascended <S%G305><s%> up to heaven <S%G3772><s%> in a cloud; <S%G3507><s%> and their enemies <S%G2190><s%> beheld <S%G2334><s%> them.

And the same <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> was there a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and the tenth <S%G1182><s%> part of the city <S%G4172><s%> fell, <S%G4098><s%> and in the earthquake <S%G4578><s%> were slain <S%G615><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> thousand: <S%G5505><s%> and the remnant <S%G3062><s%> were affrighted, <S%G1719><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
The second <S%G1208><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is past; <S%G565><s%> and, behold, <S%G2400><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> quickly. <S%G5035><s%>

And the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded; <S%G4537><s%> and there were great <S%G3173><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> The kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> are become <S%G1096><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and of his Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and he shall reign <S%G936><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

And the four <S%G5064><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders, <S%G4245><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their seats, <S%G2362><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on their faces, <S%G4383><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> We give you thanks, <S%G2168><s%> O LORD <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are, <S%G5607><s%> and were, <S%G2258><s%> and are to come; <S%G2064><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have taken <S%G2983><s%> to you your great <S%G3173><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> and have reigned. <S%G936><s%>

And the nations <S%G1484><s%> were angry, <S%G3710><s%> and your wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come, <S%G2064><s%> and the time <S%G2540><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> that they should be judged, <S%G2919><s%> and that you should give <S%G1325><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> to your servants <S%G1401><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and to the saints, <S%G40><s%> and them that fear <S%G5399><s%> your name, <S%G3686><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and great; <S%G3173><s%> and should destroy <S%G1311><s%> them which destroy <S%G1311><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And the temple <S%G3485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and there was seen <S%G3700><s%> in his temple <S%G3485><s%> the ark <S%G2787><s%> of his testament: <S%G1242><s%> and there were lightning, <S%G796><s%> and voices, <S%G5456><s%> and thunder, <S%G1027><s%> and an earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> hail. <S%G5464><s%>
